summary: The Orthography class encapsulates a configurable text normalization and tokenization scheme, handling case conversion, vocabulary mapping, word delimiter insertion, character translation, removal of specified tokens, and optional reversal of transliteration, while offering utilities to build processing pipelines and prepare data for model training.
business_intent: Provide a reusable component for NLP pipelines that standardizes input text according to orthographic rules and enables consistent decoding of model outputs, improving data quality and model performance.
